title: [Large-scale] Portuguese Oral Task Design Based on the SSARC Model: Short-Intensive Course Utilizing Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Portuguese Grammar and Vocabulary (CEFR A1 Level)
context.additional_context: A Course for Mathematics Professionals to Enhance Global Collaboration Skills Through Portuguese Proficiency. Utilizing Smartphone-Based 360-Degree Video Simulation Due to VR Environment Limitations

learning_goals: Learners achieve fluency (≥80 words per minute) and syntactic complexity (Coordination Index ≥1.2) when sequentially performing tasks from simple to complex according to the SSARC model.
Learners achieve sentence accuracy of ≥85% in tasks with real-time planning time (± planning time).
Learners achieve lexical diversity (TTR ≥0.45) when performing context-embedded (± here-and-now) tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
